trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_000010_EDMONT<tab>To the northern reaches of the Sea of Clouds, where countless isles yet remained uncharted...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_000020_EDMONT<tab>In search of a mysterious land known as Azys Lla, and the unmasked villain who sought to claim its secrets...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_000030_EDMONT<tab>Oblivious to the new threat which followed in their wake, they came...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_100010_HYDAELYN<tab>Warrior...Light. Beloved...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_100020_HYDAELYN<tab>...Hydaelyn. All made...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_100030_HYDAELYN<tab>Darkness...like to none...known...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_100040_HYDAELYN<tab>Hark...receive...blessing...more...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_200010_IGEYOHRM<tab>So falls the Lord of Mists, as did all others before him.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_200020_IGEYOHRM<tab>How many times does this make, Warrior of Light? Ahhh, how much you have grown─far beyond the limits of mere mortals.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_200030_THORDAN<tab><var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> has what we seek?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_200040_IGEYOHRM<tab>That <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> does. The key to Azys Lla and the secrets of Allag.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_200050_IGEYOHRM<tab>I see you have regained the blessing of Light─albeit at a fraction of its former strength.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_200060_THORDAN<tab>My thanks to you, Ascian─and to you as well, Warrior of Light, for saving us the effort of slaying Bismarck.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_200070_THORDAN<tab>Now that the key is within our grasp, the path to the heavens shall at last be laid bare!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_200080_THORDAN<tab>Hahaha... Ahahahahaha!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_200090_THORDAN<tab>By our deeds shall the wrongs of antiquity be righted, and man reclaim the reins of history!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Wait. Something is amiss...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Imperial troops─and they have already secured the area.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300030_REGULA<tab>Reveal yourselves at once!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300040_REGULA<tab>And there I was expecting more beastmen. Who are you!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300050_VARIS<tab>I thought Ishgardians responsible for the disappearance of our scouts, but I see now that I was mistaken.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300060_VARIS<tab>Just as Roaille observed. The Warrior of Light is wont to appear at the most inopportune times.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300070_REGULA<tab>The Warrior of Light? <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> who bested van Baelsar!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300080_VARIS<tab>It would seem that the famous hero of Eorzea seeks Azys Lla as well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300090_VARIS<tab>Hardly unexpected. The secrets of the Allagans' power to bind eikons to their will could scarcely fail to interest the Scions of the Seventh Dawn...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300100_VARIS<tab>You know as well as we what will ensue should these insatiable creatures be allowed to roam free─that their very existence threatens the life of this star. We but disagree on the solution to the problem.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300110_ALPHINAUD<tab>Genocide has ever been the Empire's favored recourse─and that is why we will continue to oppose your every attempt to claim Eorzea!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300120_VARIS<tab>You do not hesitate to speak your mind...even when your every word could be your last.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300130_VARIS<tab>Alas, your sentiments betray the narrowness of your view. The fate of Eorzea and its inhabitants is of little concern next to the fate of the world.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300140_VARIS<tab>'Tis my solemn charge as emperor to bring the eikons to heel. If this requires the extermination of certain elements, then so be it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300150_ALPHINAUD<tab>No, don't! They are not his thralls!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300160_REGULA<tab>Where did that come from!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300170_LUCIA<tab>Take cover!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300180_REGULA<tab>Your Radiance, we must withdraw!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300190_VARIS<tab>We shall meet again, Warrior of Light. On that you have my word.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_300200_ALPHINAUD<tab>So Garlemald, too, has designs on Azys Lla... But why would the Emperor himself elect to lead the expedition?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400010_LUCIA<tab>I did not think that I would ever have occasion to pilot a suit of magitek armor again─least of all under these circumstances.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400020_LUCIA<tab>My full name is Lucia goe Junius, and I was born a citizen of Garlemald.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400030_CID<tab>Ah, that explains it! When we first met in Ishgard, I very nearly called you Livia.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400040_ALPHINAUD<tab>Livia...? Livia sas Junius? The tribunus who served under Gaius van Baelsar!?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400050_LUCIA<tab>Aye, she was my sister─though we spent little time together. After our parents were killed in an uprising, we were sent to live in different households, setting us on separate paths...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400060_LUCIA<tab>Livia felt at home on the battlefield and chose to become a soldier, while I underwent training to become a spy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then...Ishgard was...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400080_LUCIA<tab>My mission. 'Twas believed that Allagan relics of great worth were stored in the Vault, and I was sent to investigate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400090_LUCIA<tab>Though I was given little information at the time, I now suspect I was searching for the key we but recently lost. And then I met Ser Aymeric.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400100_LUCIA<tab>'Twas his usefulness to my mission which prompted me to approach him, but I soon found myself drawn to him for other reasons.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400110_LUCIA<tab>He too was a prisoner of his past─judged for his heritage as a bastard son of the archbishop. Yet unlike my sister and I, he did not curse his fate. He simply rose above it.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400120_LUCIA<tab>In time, I came to realize that I had found a man worth following, and a new home besides. And when I subsequently confessed all to Ser Aymeric, he was good enough to accept me into his service.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400130_ALPHINAUD<tab>...I do not question your loyalty to Ser Aymeric. 'Tis your loyalty to your sister which concerns me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400140_LUCIA<tab>I have long been of the opinion that those who dwell in the past risk losing sight of their future.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400150_LUCIA<tab>My sister fought for her convictions, and for those she held dear. So do I. So must we all.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400160_CID<tab>Well, I for one am happy to welcome a fellow Garlean to our merry band─especially one who can make magitek armor sing!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400170_BIGGS<tab>Chief, we should be getting close.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400180_WEDGE<tab>Once we break through those clouds, we'll be right where the light was pointing─right where Azys Lla should be!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_400190_CID<tab>Hold on, everyone!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_500010_CID<tab>Look! I think that's it!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_500020_BIGGS<tab>Chief, is that...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_500030_CID<tab>Allagan, aye. There's no mistaking their handiwork.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_500040_ALPHINAUD<tab>What was that!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_500050_CID<tab>Some sort of barrier!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_500060_WEDGE<tab>She won't hold, Chief! She's breaking up!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_500070_BIGGS<tab>I've lost the auxiliary propeller!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_500080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Cid, it's no use! We must return to Ishgard and find another way!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03005_500090_CID<tab>Damn it all! Why do the Allagans always have to make everything so bloody complicated!?
